# Theobald Software HelpCenter

> The Theobald Software HelpCenter contains user documentation and knowledge base article for the following products: Xtract Universal Xtract IS Xtract for Alteryx Board Connector ERPConnect yunIO Xtract Core

# User Documentation and Knowledge Base for Xtract IS Xtract IS is a powerful SAP plug-in for SQL Server Integration Services to extract mass data. Full: https://helpcenter.theobald-software.com/xtract-is/llms-full.txt
# User Documentation and Knowledge Base for Xtract Universal Xtract Universal is a flexible SAP interface for databases, analytics, BI or cloud solutions. Full: https://helpcenter.theobald-software.com/xtract-universal/llms-full.txt
# User Documentation Knowledge Base and Templates for Xtract for Alteryx Xtract for Alteryx integrates SAP data into Alteryx by offering a simple toolbox for the Alteryx Designer. Full: https://helpcenter.theobald-software.com/xtract-for-alteryx/llms-full.txt
# User Documentation and Knowledge Base for Xtract Core Xtract Core is a web API server to extract SAP data and to write them to target environments using web calls. It can be used as a whitelabel solution. Full: https://helpcenter.theobald-software.com/xtract-core/llms-full.txt
# User Documentation and Knowledge Base for Board Connector Board Connector makes SAP data available directly from Board, without an additional data warehouse.  Full: https://helpcenter.theobald-software.com/board-connector/llms-full.txt
# HelpCenter with User Documentation and Knowledge Base for ERPConnect ERPConnect is a .NET programming library to develop SAP interfaces. Full: https://helpcenter.theobald-software.com/erpconnect/llms-full.txt
# HelpCenter with User Documentation and Knowledge Base for yunIO yunIO is an SAP process automation tool for cloud environment that accesses SAP via web services.

## Theobald Software Products

- [Theobald Software HelpCenter](https://helpcenter.theobald-software.com/index.md)
